name: Stockholm 2026 - Median Income (Below State Tax Threshold)
description: Single person earning SEK 410,000 in Stockholm (close to Swedish median salary)

sources.description: Based on Swedish Tax Agency 2026 rates: Stockholm municipal tax 30.55%, grundavdrag SEK 17,400
sources.notes: Taxable: 410,000 - 17,400 = 392,600. Municipal tax: 392,600 Ã— 30.55% = 119,939. State tax: 0. Work credit: 0 (simplified model). Net tax: 119,939. Net: 290,061. Effective rate: 29.25%
